title: These perfectly captured snaps show hilarious moments that prove it's all about timing
text:
Every photographer knows that timing is everything when it comes to capturing the perfect picture.

These hilarious snaps from around the world, compiled by eBaum's World, prove it's often down to luck when it comes to getting that money shot.

The shots include one man who was photobombed by a nosy horse, as well as a fisherman who appeared terrified by his own catch.

Another shows the exact moment a couple's kiss is spoiled by a giant crashing wave and a groom falling down the steps of the church on his wedding day.

Horsing around! This photo shows the exact moment this man's selfie was interrupted by his pet horse

Oops! This poor groom was snapped at the exact second he tripped and fell down the steps of the church on his wedding day

Close up! This snap shows a very eager pelican trying its best to get hold of one unlucky person's camera

Mini me! This amusing shot shows the power of angles as it appears one of the girls is so tiny she can fit in her pal's bike basket

Well blow me down! This scuba diver was interrupted by a blowfish that stole the focus of this underwater photo

Ouch! This man was caught on camera at the exact moment he was about to be smacked in the face by a football

Terrified! This inexperienced fisherman looked extremely afraid of the fish he'd just caught

Splash zone! This photo shows the exact moment a group of school children were soaked while visiting a beluga whale at the Hakkejima Sea Paradise aquarium in Tokyo

Making a splash! This couple had their photo ruined by a giant wave that hit as they were trying to pose on the beach
description: Every photographer knows that timing is everything when it comes to capturing  the perfect picture and these hilarious snaps from around the world, compiled by eBaum's World, prove the point.
